posts.title: Hello Meta Space
posts.text: Welcome to Meta Space! Quick Start Create a new post WIP IPFS image sample 1![Preview](ipfs://QmQxQ2jNCjBVebYd94yoxVd9mKd5aUPLd1LGEFn9MgS4kk)

posts.title: 测试RSS
posts.text: 打开Dashboard Add Panel 继续点击 Add a new panel，然后下面选择需要的 metrics

posts.title: 测试带封面的草稿
posts.text: 测试UML图 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667686970717273747576777879@startuml!include https://raw.githubusercontent.com/plantuml-stdlib/C4-PlantUML/master/C4_Container.pumlPerson(creator, "Creator")System_Boundary(meta, "Meta"){ System_Boundary(meta_cms, "Meta CMS"){ Container(cms_frontend, "CMS Frontend", "Umi.js") Container(cms_api_app, "CMS API Application", "Nest.js", "Handles all business logic") ContainerDb(cms_db, "CMS Database", "MySQL", "Holds social media platform aggregation,service pipeline information", $sprite="mysql_server") } Container(ucenter_api_app, "UCenter API Application", "Nest.js", "Handles all user/account/auth logic") ContainerDb(ucenter_db, "UCenter Database", "MySQL", "Holds user,account,auth information", $sprite="mysql_server") Container(fan_ticket_api_app, "Fan Ticket API Application", "Nest.js", "Handles all fan ticket logic") ContainerDb(fan_ticket_db, "Fan Ticket Database", "MySQL", "Holds fan ticket information", $sprite="mysql_server") ContainerQueue(message_broker, "Message Broker","NATS") System_Boundary(meta_network, "Meta Network"){ Container(meta_network_frontend, "Meta Network Frontend", "React.js") Container(meta_network_api_app, "Meta Network API Application", "Nest.js", "Handles all Social Network logic") ContainerDb(meta_network_db, "Meta Network Database", "MySQL", "Holds social network information", $sprite="mysql_server") } System(nft_market, "NFT Market")}System(meta_space, "Meta Space")System_Ext(git_repo_provider, "Git Repo Provider","如 Github")System_Ext(publisher, "Publisher","如 Github Pages,Vercel,Netlify")Rel(creator, cms_frontend, "Uses","https")Rel(creator, meta_network_frontend, "Uses","https")Rel(cms_frontend, ucenter_api_app, "Uses","https")Rel(cms_frontend, cms_api_app, "Uses","https")Rel(cms_frontend, fan_ticket_api_app, "Uses","https")Rel(ucenter_api_app, ucenter_db, "Reads/Writes")Rel(cms_api_app, cms_db, "Reads/Writes")Rel(fan_ticket_api_app, fan_ticket_db, "Reads/Writes")Rel(meta_network_frontend, ucenter_api_app, "Uses","https")Rel(meta_network_frontend, meta_network_api_app, "Uses","https")Rel(meta_network_frontend, cms_api_app, "Uses","https")Rel(meta_network_api_app, meta_network_db, "Reads/Writes")'Rel(ucenter_api_app, message_broker, "Pub/Sub")'Rel(cms_api_app, message_broker, "Pub/Sub")'Rel(fan_ticket_api_app, message_broker, "Pub/Sub")'Rel(meta_network_api_app, message_broker, "Pub/Sub")Rel(cms_api_app, git_repo_provider, "Uses")Rel(cms_api_app, publisher, "Uses")Rel(publisher, git_repo_provider, "Reads")Rel(publisher, meta_space, "Builds & Hosts")Rel(meta_space, nft_market, "Refer / Link")Rel_L(nft_market, ucenter_api_app, "Uses", "https")SHOW_FLOATING_LEGEND()@enduml 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526@startuml!include https://raw.githubusercontent.com/plantuml-stdlib/C4-PlantUML/master/C4_Container.pumlAddElementTag("v1.0", $borderColor="#d73027")AddElementTag("v1.1", $fontColor="#d73027")AddElementTag("backup", $fontColor="orange")AddRelTag("backup", $textColor="orange", $lineColor="orange", $lineStyle = DashedLine())Person(user, "Customer", "People that need products")Person(admin, "Administrator", "People that administrates the products via the new v1.1 components", $tags="v1.1")Container(spa, "SPA", "angular", "The main interface that the customer interacts with via v1.0", $tags="v1.0")Container(spaAdmin, "Admin SPA", "angular", "The administrator interface that the customer interacts with via new v1.1", $tags="v1.1")Container(api, "API", "java", "Handles all business logic (incl. new v1.1 extensions)", $tags="v1.0+v1.1")ContainerDb(db, "Database", "Microsoft SQL", "Holds product, order and invoice information")Container(archive, "Archive", "Audit logging", "Stores 5 years", $tags="backup")Rel(user, spa, "Uses", "https")Rel(spa, api, "Uses", "https")Rel_R(api, db, "Reads/Writes")Rel(admin, spaAdmin, "Uses", "https")Rel(spaAdmin, api, "Uses", "https")Rel_L(api, archive, "Writes", "messages", $tags="backup")SHOW_LEGEND()@enduml ` IPFS: bafybeifwrz6iywguztyete72gawtu42hm4t7mk5bhsv4o5ey6xv3bevrdi
